title: Gary McLellan
text: Gary McLellan is a Scottish filmmaker and former student of the <a href="SAE%20Institute">SAE Institute</a> in Glasgow. In July 2019, he became the deputy director of the <a href="Glasgow%20Filmmakers%20Alliance">Glasgow Filmmakers Alliance</a> following the promotion of <a href="Chris%20Quick">Chris Quick</a> to director of the organisation. On 31st December 2021, McLellan stood down as Deputy Director.
